name: Militidas Stanis
story: Militidas Stanis was born and raised in a small village in Greece. He joined the Greek military at a young age and served for several years before joining the independent faction in Arma 3. He quickly rose through the ranks and became a sergeant. He is known for his bravery and discipline, and is highly respected by his fellow soldiers. He is married to his high school sweetheart and they have two young children.
